About Me

Welcome to my personal website! I'm James Chang, a versatile individual with passions spanning music, technology, art, and literature. My diverse interests have shaped me into a multifaceted problem-solver who approaches challenges from unique perspectives.

This website serves as a portfolio of my work and interests, showcasing the various dimensions of my life and creative pursuits.
